summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of Iron Beast Gym website. All core functionality working perfectly including navigation, BMI calculator, WhatsApp integration, mobile responsiveness, and interactive elements.

ui_bugs.issue: Pricing section navigation link occasionally fails to scroll to target

seo_issues.issue: Page shows default Emergent template title 'Emergent | Fullstack App' instead of gym-specific title from index.html

passed_tests: Hero section renders with correct headline 'Transform Your Body. Transform Your Life.'
All navigation links present and functional (About, Services, Plans, Gallery, BMI, Contact)
WhatsApp Join Now buttons work correctly (3/3 tested)
About section displays correct stats (3+ years, 15+ trainers, 500+ members)
Services section shows all 4 service cards
Pricing section displays 3 plans with correct prices (₹1,500, ₹4,000, ₹12,000)
All Choose Plan buttons link to WhatsApp correctly
Gallery section displays all 4 transformation images
Testimonials section shows all 3 customer reviews
BMI Calculator accepts input and calculates correctly for all categories (Underweight/Normal/Overweight/Obese)
BMI Calculator shows appropriate error handling for empty and invalid inputs
Google Maps iframe loads correctly for Chandrapur location
Contact section shows complete information (address, phone, business hours)
Mobile responsive navigation (hamburger menu) works perfectly
Mobile layout adapts properly to small screen sizes
Social media links (Instagram, Facebook) present and functional
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix SEO elements: The page title and meta description are showing default Emergent template values instead of the gym-specific content defined in index.html. This is likely a build/deployment configuration issue where the custom HTML is being overridden.
